charFilters: Char filters are reusable components used by analyzers to transform text before tokenization.
odataType: A URI fragment specifying the type of char filter.
name: The name of the char filter. It must only contain letters, digits, spaces, dashes or underscores; it must start/end with an alphanumeric character; max length 128.
mappings: A list of mappings in the format "a=>b". All occurrences of 'a' are replaced with 'b'.
